org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.strategy

Class AbstractDiffuserStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.strategy.AbstractDiffuserStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.freezedry.persistence.copyable.Copyable<DiffuserStrategy>, DiffuserStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomDiffuserStrategy, RandomWeightedDiffuserStrategy

    public abstract class AbstractDiffuserStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiffuserStrategy
    Abstract class that deals with the List of end-point URI. Implementing classes need to implement the DiffuserStrategy.getEndpoints() method from the DiffuserStrategy interface.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

        Parameters:
        endpoints - The list of end-points to which to diffuse methods.

      • AbstractDiffuserStrategy

        protected AbstractDiffuserStrategy(java.util.Map<java.net.URI,java.lang.Double> endpoints)
        Constructs a DiffuserStrategy that holds the specified list of end-points with the specified weights
        Parameters:
        endpoints - The map of end-points (values) and their associated weights (keys) to which to diffuse methods.
